alert.note: Alert for Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 10:06AM EST until further notice by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Ohio... Indiana... Auglaize River near Fort Jennings affecting Allen OH, Paulding and Putnam Counties. Maumee River at Napoleon affecting Henry County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. Saint Marys River at St. Mary`s River near Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Ohio... Maumee River at Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN and Paulding Counties. Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier affecting Williams County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Allen IN, De Kalb and Defiance Counties. Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, County Road K, one mile southwest of Montpelier begins to flood. Some flooding begins to affect the village of Pioneer. Significant low land and agricultural flooding occurs near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Friday, February 18 the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.7 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
